# The zend_test extension

Configure the `zend_test` extension.

This extension provides additional support for testing PHP itself.

## PHP_EXT_ZEND_TEST

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_ZEND_TEST_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
